<h2 id="调取pro版数据">调取pro版数据</h2>
<hr>
<p>下面介绍两种常用的数据调取方式：</p>
<ul>
<li>通过tushare python包</li>
<li>使用http协议直接获取</li>
</ul>
<p><font color="red">注：pro版数据接口采用语言无关的http协议实现，但也提供了多种语言的<a href="https://tushare.pro/document/1?doc_id=129">SDK数据获取</a>。</font></p>
<h3 id="前提条件">前提条件</h3>
<p>1、已经注册了tushare社区用户 【<a href="https://tushare.pro/register">注册用户</a>】<br>2、已经获取到tushare token凭证 【<a href="https://tushare.pro/document/1?doc_id=39">获取token</a>】</p>
<h3 id="python-sdk">Python SDK</h3>
<h4 id="下载sdk">下载SDK</h4>
<p>下载并安装最新版tushare SDK 【<a href="https://tushare.pro/document/1?doc_id=7">安装和升级方法</a>】</p>
<p><strong>导入tushare</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">import tushare as ts</code></pre>
<p>这里注意， tushare版本需大于1.2.10</p>
<p><strong>设置token</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">ts.set_token(&#39;your token here&#39;)</code></pre>
<p>以上方法只需要在第一次或者token失效后调用，完成调取tushare数据凭证的设置，正常情况下不需要重复设置。也可以忽略此步骤，直接用pro_api(&#39;your token&#39;)完成初始化</p>
<p><strong>初始化pro接口</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">pro = ts.pro_api()</code></pre>
<p>如果上一步骤ts.set_token(&#39;your token&#39;)无效或不想保存token到本地，也可以在初始化接口里直接设置token:</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">pro = ts.pro_api(&#39;your token&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据调取</strong></p>
<p>以获取交易日历信息为例：</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">df = pro.trade_cal(exchange=&#39;&#39;, start_date=&#39;20180901&#39;, end_date=&#39;20181001&#39;, fields=&#39;exchange,cal_date,is_open,pretrade_date&#39;, is_open=&#39;0&#39;)</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">df = pro.query(&#39;trade_cal&#39;, exchange=&#39;&#39;, start_date=&#39;20180901&#39;, end_date=&#39;20181001&#39;, fields=&#39;exchange,cal_date,is_open,pretrade_date&#39;, is_open=&#39;0&#39;)</code></pre>
<p>调取结果：</p>
<pre><code>    exchange  cal_date    is_open pretrade_date
0          SSE       20180901        0      20180831
1          SSE       20180902        0      20180831
2          SSE       20180908        0      20180907
3          SSE       20180909        0      20180907
4          SSE       20180915        0      20180914
5          SSE       20180916        0      20180914
6          SSE       20180922        0      20180921
7          SSE       20180923        0      20180921
8          SSE       20180924        0      20180921
9          SSE       20180929        0      20180928
10         SSE       20180930        0      20180928
11         SSE       20181001        0      20180928</code></pre><h3 id="http协议方式">HTTP协议方式</h3>
<p>http restful 采用post方式，通过json body传入接口参数，请求地址为<a href="http://api.tushare.pro">http://api.tushare.pro</a> </p>
<h4 id="输入参数">输入参数</h4>
<ul>
<li>api_name，接口名称；</li>
<li>token，用于识别唯一用户的标识；</li>
<li>params，接口参数，如daily接口中start_date和end_date；</li>
<li>fields，字段列表，用于接口获取指定的字段，以逗号分隔，如&quot;open,high,low,close&quot;；</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="输出参数">输出参数</h4>
<ul>
<li>code: 接口返回码，2002表示权限问题。</li>
<li>msg: 错误信息；</li>
<li>data: 具体数据，成功的请求包含fields和items字段，fields与items数据一一对齐；</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="示例">示例</h4>
<p>采用命令行工具curl的请求示例如下：</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">curl -X POST -d &#39;{&quot;api_name&quot;: &quot;trade_cal&quot;, &quot;token&quot;: &quot;xxxxxxxx&quot;, &quot;params&quot;: {&quot;exchange&quot;:&quot;&quot;, &quot;start_date&quot;:&quot;20180901&quot;, &quot;end_date&quot;:&quot;20181001&quot;, &quot;is_open&quot;:&quot;0&quot;}, &quot;fields&quot;: &quot;exchange,cal_date,is_open,pretrade_date&quot;}&#39; http://api.tushare.pro</code></pre>
<p>返回结果：</p>
<pre><code>{
        &quot;code&quot;:0,
        &quot;msg&quot;:null,
        &quot;data&quot;:{
                &quot;fields&quot;:[
                        &quot;exchange&quot;,
                        &quot;cal_date&quot;,
                        &quot;is_open&quot;,
                        &quot;pretrade_date&quot;
                ],
                &quot;items&quot;:[
                        [
                                &quot;SSE&quot;,
                                &quot;20180901&quot;,
                                0,
                                &quot;20180831&quot;
                        ],
                        [
                                &quot;SSE&quot;,
                                &quot;20180902&quot;,
                                0,
                                &quot;20180831&quot;
                        ],
                        [
                                &quot;SSE&quot;,
                                &quot;20180908&quot;,
                                0,
                                &quot;20180907&quot;
                        ],

            ...

                        [
                                &quot;SSE&quot;,
                                &quot;20180929&quot;,
                                0,
                                &quot;20180928&quot;
                        ],
                        [
                                &quot;SSE&quot;,
                                &quot;20180930&quot;,
                                0,
                                &quot;20180928&quot;
                        ],
                        [
                                &quot;SSE&quot;,
                                &quot;20181001&quot;,
                                0,
                                &quot;20180928&quot;
                        ]
                ]
        }
}</code></pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<div class="container">
<div class="document">
<nav class="sidebar col-md-3 col-sm-4 col-xs-12">

            <div id="jstree">
                <ul class="list-unstyled components">
                    
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=14">沪深股票</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=24">基础数据</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=25">股票列表</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=329">每日股本（盘前）</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=26">交易日历</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=100">股票曾用名</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=104">沪深股通成分股</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=112">上市公司基本信息</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=193">上市公司管理层</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=194">管理层薪酬和持股</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=123">IPO新股上市</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=262">备用列表</a></li>
                        </ul>

                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=15">行情数据</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=27">日线行情</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=144">周线行情</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=145">月线行情</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=336">股票周/月线行情(每日更新)</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=146">复权行情</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=28">复权因子</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=315">实时快照（爬虫）</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=316">实时成交（爬虫）</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=317">实时排名（爬虫）</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=32">每日指标</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=109">通用行情接口</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=170">个股资金流向</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=183">每日涨跌停价格</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=214">每日停复牌信息</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=47">沪深港通资金流向</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=48">沪深股通十大成交股</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=49">港股通十大成交股</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=196">港股通每日成交统计</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=197">港股通每月成交统计</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=255">备用行情</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                 
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=16">财务数据</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=33">利润表</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=36">资产负债表</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=44">现金流量表</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=45">业绩预告</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=46">业绩快报</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=103">分红送股数据</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=79">财务指标数据</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=80">财务审计意见</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=81">主营业务构成</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=162">财报披露日期表</a></li>
                        </ul>

require(['custom']);

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<h2 id="pycharm的安装和使用">Pycharm的安装和使用</h2>
<p>作者： Tushare社区用户 <b>gao</b></p>
<hr>
<p>下载和安装：</p>
<p>1、打开pycharm官网（网址：<a href="http://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/download" target="_blank">http://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/download</a>），下载linux或者Windows的community版本，大多数功能community版本都能满足。</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_1.png" alt=""></p>
<p>2、安装包下载下来后，双击下载下来的.exe文件就可以安装了，JRE一般不用勾选。</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_2.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_3.png" alt=""></p>
<p>3、等待安装完毕，Finish，勾选Run，之后直接点OK。</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_4.png" alt=""></p>
<p>4、选择界面风格，点击Skip Remaining and Set Defaults </p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_5.png" alt=""></p>
<p>简单应用：</p>
<p>1、Create New Project</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_6.png" alt=""></p>
<p>2、填写新建项目的路径，第一次creating virtual environment 的时候慢一点，耐心等待就可以了。</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_7.png" alt=""></p>
<p>3、配置project的python环境，Default setting-project interpreter</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_8.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_9.png" alt=""></p>
<p>根据需要配置本地已安装的anaconda环境，三个界面都改成自己需要的，OK确认，等待creating conda environment完成。</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_10.png" alt=""></p>
<p>4、新建python文件</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_11.png" alt=""></p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_12.png" alt=""></p>
<p>5、运行</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_13.png" alt=""></p>
<p>第一次需要设置python interpreter 为上一步default setting的python环境</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_14.png" alt=""></p>
<p>6、断点设置</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_15.png" alt=""></p>
<p>7、debug调试</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_16.png" alt=""></p>
<p>F8单步调试，在debugger里面看到valiables</p>
<p><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/img/pycharm/pyc_17.png" alt=""></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<h2 id="现金流量表">现金流量表</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：cashflow，可以通过<a href="https://tushare.pro/webclient/"><strong>数据工具</strong></a>调试和查看数据。<br>描述：获取上市公司现金流量表<br>积分：用户需要至少2000积分才可以调取，具体请参阅<a href="https://tushare.pro/document/1?doc_id=13">积分获取办法</a><br><font color="red"><br>提示：当前接口只能按单只股票获取其历史数据，如果需要获取某一季度全部上市公司数据，请使用cashflow_vip接口（参数一致），需积攒5000积分。<br></font></p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>股票代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>公告日期（YYYYMMDD格式，下同）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>f_ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>实际公告日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>公告开始日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>公告结束日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>period</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>报告期(每个季度最后一天的日期，比如20171231表示年报)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>report_type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>报告类型：见下方详细说明</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>comp_type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>公司类型：1一般工商业 2银行 3保险 4证券</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>is_calc</td>
<td>int</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>是否计算报表</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>默认显示</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>TS股票代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>公告日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>f_ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>实际公告日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>报告期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>comp_type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>公司类型(1一般工商业2银行3保险4证券)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>report_type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>报表类型</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>报告期类型</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>net_profit</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>净利润</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>finan_exp</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>财务费用</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>c_fr_sale_sg</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>销售商品、提供劳务收到的现金</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>recp_tax_rends</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>收到的税费返还</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>n_depos_incr_fi</td>

</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<p><strong>接口使用说明</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

df = pro.cashflow(ts_code=&#39;600000.SH&#39;, start_date=&#39;20180101&#39;, end_date=&#39;20180730&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p>获取某一季度全部股票数据</p>
<pre><code>df2 = pro.cashflow_vip(period=&#39;20181231&#39;,fields=&#39;&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>     ts_code  ann_date f_ann_date  end_date comp_type report_type    net_profit finan_exp  \
0  600000.SH  20180428   20180428  20180331         2           1           NaN      None   
1  600000.SH  20180428   20180428  20171231         2           1  5.500200e+10      None   
2  600000.SH  20180428   20180428  20171231         2           1  5.500200e+10      None
    
    
</code></pre>
<p><strong>主要报表类型说明</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>代码</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>说明</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>1</td>
<td>合并报表</td>
<td>上市公司最新报表（默认）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>2</td>
<td>单季合并</td>
<td>单一季度的合并报表</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>3</td>
<td>调整单季合并表</td>
<td>调整后的单季合并报表（如果有）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>4</td>
<td>调整合并报表</td>
<td>本年度公布上年同期的财务报表数据，报告期为上年度</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>5</td>
<td>调整前合并报表</td>
<td>数据发生变更，将原数据进行保留，即调整前的原数据</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>6</td>
<td>母公司报表</td>
<td>该公司母公司的财务报表数据</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>7</td>
<td>母公司单季表</td>
<td>母公司的单季度表</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>8</td>
<td>母公司调整单季表</td>
<td>母公司调整后的单季表</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>9</td>
<td>母公司调整表</td>
<td>该公司母公司的本年度公布上年同期的财务报表数据</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>10</td>
<td>母公司调整前报表</td>
<td>母公司调整之前的原始财务报表数据</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>11</td>
<td>目公司调整前合并报表</td>
<td>母公司调整之前合并报表原数据</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>12</td>
<td>母公司调整前报表</td>
<td>母公司报表发生变更前保留的原数据</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>

</div>
</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<h2 id="业绩预告">业绩预告</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：forecast，可以通过<a href="https://tushare.pro/webclient/"><strong>数据工具</strong></a>调试和查看数据。<br>描述：获取业绩预告数据<br>权限：用户需要至少2000积分才可以调取，具体请参阅<a href="https://tushare.pro/document/1?doc_id=13">积分获取办法</a><br><font color="red"><br>提示：当前接口只能按单只股票获取其历史数据，如果需要获取某一季度全部上市公司数据，请使用forecast_vip接口（参数一致），需积攒5000积分。<br></font></p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>股票代码(二选一)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>公告日期 (二选一)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>公告开始日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>公告结束日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>period</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>报告期(每个季度最后一天的日期，比如20171231表示年报)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>预告类型(预增/预减/扭亏/首亏/续亏/续盈/略增/略减)</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>TS股票代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>公告日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>报告期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>业绩预告类型(预增/预减/扭亏/首亏/续亏/续盈/略增/略减)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>p_change_min</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>预告净利润变动幅度下限（%）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>p_change_max</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>预告净利润变动幅度上限（%）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>net_profit_min</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>预告净利润下限（万元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>net_profit_max</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>预告净利润上限（万元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>last_parent_net</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>上年同期归属母公司净利润</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>first_ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>首次公告日</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>summary</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>业绩预告摘要</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>change_reason</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>业绩变动原因</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口用法</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

pro.forecast(ann_date=&#39;20190131&#39;, fields=&#39;ts_code,ann_date,end_date,type,p_change_min,p_change_max,net_profit_min&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p>获取某一季度全部股票数据</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
df = pro.forecast_vip(period=&#39;20181231&#39;,fields=&#39;ts_code,ann_date,end_date,type,p_change_min,p_change_max,net_profit_min&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>       ts_code  ann_date  end_date type  p_change_min  p_change_max  \
0    000005.SZ  20190131  20181231   预增      618.5600      945.1800   
1    000825.SZ  20190131  20181231   略增        3.8500       12.5100   
2    000566.SZ  20190131  20181231   预增       50.0000      100.0000   
3    000932.SZ  20190131  20181231   预增       60.8864       68.1664   
4    000557.SZ  20190131  20181231   预增       66.6800       66.6800   
5    600127.SH  20190131  20181231   首亏     -601.5517     -510.3604   
6    600159.SH  20190131  20181231   预增      315.0000      315.0000   
7    600963.SH  20190131  20181231   略增        2.3800       11.5800   
8    002336.SZ  20190131  20181231   续亏       33.1367       47.9952   
9    601608.SH  20190131  20181231   预增      228.5900      274.5700   
10   600531.SH  20190131  20181231   预减      -61.8800      -54.3200   
11   300200.SZ  20190131  20181231   预增       82.4000      112.4000   
12   300441.SZ  20190131  20181231   略减      -20.5100       -0.6400   
13   300157.SZ  20190131  20181231   扭亏      107.3969      108.5176   
14   300052.SZ  20190131  20181231   略减      -30.0000        0.0000   
15   002328.SZ  20190131  20181231   略增        0.0000       20.0000   
16   300420.SZ  20190131  20181231   预增       61.1500       90.8000   
17   300109.SZ  20190131  20181231   续盈      -13.8100        7.7300   
18   300479.SZ  20190131  20181231   略减      -35.8400       -6.6700   
19   000402.SZ  20190131  20181231   略增        1.0000       10.0000   
20   002626.SZ  20190131  20181231   略增       37.1200       47.6600
</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

                        <ul class="list-unstyled">

                        </ul>
                    </li>
                 
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=330">两融及转融通</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=58">融资融券交易汇总</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=59">融资融券交易明细</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=326">融资融券标的（盘前）</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=332">转融券交易汇总</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=331">转融资交易汇总</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=333">转融券交易明细</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=334">做市借券交易汇总</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                  
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=93">指数</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=94">指数基本信息</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=95">指数日线行情</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=171">指数周线行情</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=172">指数月线行情</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=96">指数成分和权重</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=128">大盘指数每日指标</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=181">申万行业分类</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=182">申万行业成分</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=335">申万行业成分（分级）</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=215">沪深市场每日交易统计</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=268">深圳市场每日交易情况</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=259">同花顺概念和行业列表</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=260">同花顺概念和行业指数行情</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=261">同花顺概念和行业指数成分</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=308">中信行业指数日行情</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=327">申万行业指数日行情</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=211">国际主要指数</a></li>

<h2 id="业绩快报">业绩快报</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：express<br>描述：获取上市公司业绩快报<br>权限：用户需要至少2000积分才可以调取，具体请参阅<a href="https://tushare.pro/document/1?doc_id=13">积分获取办法</a><br><font color="red"><br>提示：当前接口只能按单只股票获取其历史数据，如果需要获取某一季度全部上市公司数据，请使用express_vip接口（参数一致），需积攒5000积分。<br></font></p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>股票代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>公告日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>公告开始日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>公告结束日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>period</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>报告期(每个季度最后一天的日期,比如20171231表示年报)</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>TS股票代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>公告日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>报告期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>revenue</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>营业收入(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>operate_profit</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>营业利润(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>total_profit</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>利润总额(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>n_income</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>净利润(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>total_assets</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>总资产(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>total_hldr_eqy_exc_min_int</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>股东权益合计(不含少数股东权益)(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>diluted_eps</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>每股收益(摊薄)(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>diluted_roe</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>净资产收益率(摊薄)(%)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>yoy_net_profit</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>去年同期修正后净利润</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>bps</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>每股净资产</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>yoy_sales</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>同比增长率:营业收入</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>yoy_op</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>同比增长率:营业利润</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>yoy_tp</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>同比增长率:利润总额</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>yoy_dedu_np</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>同比增长率:归属母公司股东的净利润</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>yoy_eps</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>同比增长率:基本每股收益</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>yoy_roe</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>同比增减:加权平均净资产收益率</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>growth_assets</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>比年初增长率:总资产</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>yoy_equity</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>比年初增长率:归属母公司的股东权益</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>growth_bps</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>比年初增长率:归属于母公司股东的每股净资产</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>or_last_year</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>去年同期营业收入</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>op_last_year</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>去年同期营业利润</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>tp_last_year</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>去年同期利润总额</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>np_last_year</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>去年同期净利润</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>eps_last_year</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>去年同期每股收益</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>open_net_assets</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>期初净资产</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>open_bps</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>期初每股净资产</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>perf_summary</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>业绩简要说明</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>is_audit</td>
<td>int</td>
<td>是否审计： 1是 0否</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>remark</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>备注</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口用法</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

pro.express(ts_code=&#39;600000.SH&#39;, start_date=&#39;20180101&#39;, end_date=&#39;20180701&#39;, fields=&#39;ts_code,ann_date,end_date,revenue,operate_profit,total_profit,n_income,total_assets&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p>获取某一季度全部股票数据</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
df = pro.express_vip(period=&#39;20181231&#39;,fields=&#39;ts_code,ann_date,end_date,revenue,operate_profit,total_profit,n_income,total_assets&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>     ts_code  ann_date  end_date       revenue  operate_profit  total_profit      n_income  total_assets  \
0  603535.SH  20180411  20180331  2.064659e+08    3.345047e+07  3.340047e+07  2.672643e+07  1.682111e+09   
1  603535.SH  20180208  20171231  1.034262e+09    1.323373e+08  1.440493e+08  1.188325e+08  1.710466e+09   
2  603535.SH  20171016  20170930  7.064117e+08    9.509520e+07  9.931530e+07  8.202480e+07  1.672986e+09
</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<h2 id="沪深港通资金流向">沪深港通资金流向</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：moneyflow_hsgt，可以通过<a href="https://tushare.pro/webclient/"><strong>数据工具</strong></a>调试和查看数据。<br>描述：获取沪股通、深股通、港股通每日资金流向数据，每次最多返回300条记录，总量不限制。每天18~20点之间完成当日更新<br>积分要求：2000积分起，5000积分每分钟可提取500次</p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>交易日期 (二选一)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>开始日期 (二选一)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>结束日期</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>交易日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ggt_ss</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>港股通（上海）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ggt_sz</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>港股通（深圳）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>hgt</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>沪股通（百万元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sgt</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>深股通（百万元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>north_money</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>北向资金（百万元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>south_money</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>南向资金（百万元）</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口用法</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

pro.moneyflow_hsgt(start_date=&#39;20180125&#39;, end_date=&#39;20180808&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro.query(&#39;moneyflow_hsgt&#39;, trade_date=&#39;20180725&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>   trade_date  ggt_ss  ggt_sz      hgt      sgt  north_money  south_money
0    20180808  -476.0  -188.0   962.68   799.94      1762.62       -664.0
1    20180807  -261.0   177.0  2140.85  1079.82      3220.67        -84.0
2    20180803   667.0   -32.0  -436.99  1088.07       651.08        635.0
3    20180802 -1651.0  -366.0   874.97  -216.65       658.32      -2017.0
4    20180801 -1443.0  -443.0   544.36   542.79      1087.15      -1886.0
5    20180731  -299.0   -21.0  1923.72  1345.48      3269.20       -320.0
6    20180730  -588.0   611.0  2536.54   146.24      2682.78         23.0
7    20180727   -13.0   363.0  2182.84   533.06      2715.90        350.0
8    20180726  -566.0  -339.0  1113.28  -567.47       545.81       -905.0
9    20180725   319.0   370.0  1470.29   311.27      1781.56        689.0
10   20180724   924.0  2312.0  1748.88  1053.52      2802.40       3236.0
11   20180723  1628.0  1172.0  -279.96   334.82        54.86       2800.0
12   20180720  2233.0  1773.0   606.33  1711.77      2318.10       4006.0
13   20180719   456.0   206.0  1831.41   874.40      2705.81        662.0
14   20180718  -181.0   261.0   126.80  -111.83        14.97         80.0
15   20180717  -390.0   187.0   -90.32  -404.24      -494.56       -203.0
16   20180716  -539.0    52.0  -457.00   487.60        30.60       -487.0
17   20180713  -297.0   751.0   599.38   658.07      1257.45        454.0
18   20180712  2635.0  1699.0  1695.62   269.56      1965.18       4334.0
19   20180711    19.0   646.0   261.96  -339.20       -77.24        665.0
20   20180710   668.0   889.0   514.05   262.33       776.38       1557.0
</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>

require([

], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<h2 id="沪深股通十大成交股">沪深股通十大成交股</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：hsgt_top10<br>描述：获取沪股通、深股通每日前十大成交详细数据，每天18~20点之间完成当日更新</p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>股票代码（二选一）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>交易日期（二选一）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>开始日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>结束日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>market_type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>市场类型（1：沪市 3：深市）</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>交易日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>股票代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>股票名称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>close</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>收盘价</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>change</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>涨跌额</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rank</td>
<td>int</td>
<td>资金排名</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>market_type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>市场类型（1：沪市 3：深市）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>amount</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>成交金额（元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>net_amount</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>净成交金额（元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>buy</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>买入金额（元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sell</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>卖出金额（元）</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口用法</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">pro = ts.pro_api()

pro.hsgt_top10(trade_date=&#39;20180725&#39;, market_type=&#39;1&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro.query(&#39;hsgt_top10&#39;, ts_code=&#39;600519.SH&#39;, start_date=&#39;20180701&#39;, end_date=&#39;20180725&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>  trade_date    ts_code  name       close  change  rank  market_type  \
0   20180725  600009.SH  上海机场   62.69    2.0677     9            1   
1   20180725  600019.SH  宝钢股份    8.62    0.9368     7            1   
2   20180725  600036.SH  招商银行   28.22    1.6937    10            1

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<h2 id="港股通十大成交股">港股通十大成交股</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：ggt_top10<br>描述：获取港股通每日成交数据，其中包括沪市、深市详细数据，每天18~20点之间完成当日更新</p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>股票代码（二选一）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>交易日期（二选一）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>开始日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>结束日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>market_type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>市场类型 2：港股通（沪） 4：港股通（深）</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>交易日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>股票代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>股票名称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>close</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>收盘价</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>p_change</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>涨跌幅</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rank</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>资金排名</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>market_type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>市场类型 2：港股通（沪） 4：港股通（深）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>amount</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>累计成交金额（元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>net_amount</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>净买入金额（元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sh_amount</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>沪市成交金额（元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sh_net_amount</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>沪市净买入金额（元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sh_buy</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>沪市买入金额（元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sh_sell</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>沪市卖出金额</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sz_amount</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>深市成交金额（元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sz_net_amount</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>深市净买入金额（元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sz_buy</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>深市买入金额（元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sz_sell</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>深市卖出金额（元）</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口用法</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

pro.ggt_top10(trade_date=&#39;20180727&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro.query(&#39;ggt_top10&#39;, ts_code=&#39;00700&#39;, start_date=&#39;20180701&#39;, end_date=&#39;20180727&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>   trade_date ts_code       name   close   p_change  rank   market_type  \

require(['custom']);

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<html lang="en" style="height:100%">
<head>

<h2 id="-">交易所交易对</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：coinpair<br>描述：获取Tushare所能提供的所有交易和交易对名称，用于获得行情等数据。</p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>exchange</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>交易所</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>exchange</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>交易所</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>exchange_pair</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>交易所原始交易对名称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ts_pair</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Tushare标准名称</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>交易所列表</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>

<th>交易所名称</th>

<p><strong>接口用法</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

df = pro.coinpair(exchange=&#39;huobi&#39;, trade_date=&#39;20180802&#39;)

</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
df = pro.query(&#39;coinpair&#39;, exchange=&#39;huobi&#39;, trade_date=&#39;20180802&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>  trade_date exchange exchange_pair   ts_pair
0   20180802    huobi       btcusdt   btcusdt
1   20180802    huobi       bchusdt   bchusdt
2   20180802    huobi       ethusdt   ethusdt
3   20180802    huobi       etcusdt   etcusdt
4   20180802    huobi       ltcusdt   ltcusdt
5   20180802    huobi       eosusdt   eosusdt
6   20180802    huobi       xrpusdt   xrpusdt
7   20180802    huobi       omgusdt   omgusdt
8   20180802    huobi      dashusdt  dashusdt
9   20180802    huobi       zecusdt   zecusdt</code></pre>

themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,

window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});

                <ul class="list-unstyled components">
                    
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=14">沪深股票</a>

                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=24">基础数据</a>

<h2 id="-">数字货币行情数据</h2>
<p>Tushare Pro规划和采集了超过40家主流交易所的行情数据，目前主要提供了包括1分钟、5分钟、15分钟、30分钟、1小时、3小时、6小时等不同频度的数据，也提供了日线级别数据，数据指标包括高开低收、成交量、成交额等。</p>
<ul>
<li>分钟数据</li>
<li>日线数据</li>
<li>高频数据</li>
<li>主要数字货币每日市值</li>
<li><a href="https://tushare.pro/document/41?doc_id=76">比特币每日市值</a></li>
<li><a href="https://tushare.pro/document/41?doc_id=77">比特币每日量价</a></li>
</ul>
<p>数据还在不断上新，请社区用户耐心等待......</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<div class="content col-md-9 col-sm-8 col-xs-12">
<div class="search-panel">

<h2 id="-">全球数字货币列表</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：coinlist<br>描述：获取全球数字货币基本信息，包括发行日期、规模、所基于的公链和算法等。</p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>issue_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>发行日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>开始日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>结束日期</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>coin</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>货币代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>en_name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>英文名称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>cn_name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>中文名称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>issue_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>发行日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>issue_price</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>发行价格（美元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>amount</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>发行总量</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>supply</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>流通总量</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>algo</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>算法原理</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>area</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>发行地区</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>desc</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>描述</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>labels</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>标签分类</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口用法</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

df = pro.coinlist(start_date=&#39;20170101&#39;, end_date=&#39;20171231&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
df = pro.query(&#39;coinlist&#39;, start_date=&#39;20170101&#39;, end_date=&#39;20171231&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>      coin                         en_name  cn_name issue_date        amount \
0    PYLNT                           Pylon     None   20171231  6.338580e+05
1      hlc                      HalalChain    绿色食品链   20171230  1.000000e+09
2      qlc                           Qlink     None   20171230  6.000000e+08
3       XP               Experience Points     None   20171230  2.683600e+11
4      CHT                   CoinHot Token       热币   20171230  3.692800e+08
5      DBC                 DeepBrain Chain      深脑链   20171229  1.000000e+10
6     HTML                        HTMLCoin     None   20171229  9.404459e+10
7      mot                    Olympus Labs     奥林巴斯   20171229  1.000000e+08
8     CPAY                       Cryptopay     None   20171229  9.041474e+07
9      dcr                          Decred     None   20171228  2.100000e+07
10     XPS                          Xpense     None   20171228  2.000000e+10
11     DIM                         DIMCOIN     None   20171228  9.000000e+09
12   ZIBER                           ZIBER     None   20171228  8.000000e+07
13    bnty                        Bounty0x     None   20171227  5.000000e+08
14      gt                         G Token     None   20171227  1.000000e+08
15    bifi                    Bitcoin File     None   20171227  2.100000e+10
16     ent                        ENT Cash     None   20171226  1.600000e+09
17     big                    BigONE Token     None   20171225  2.000000e+08
18     DAI                             Dai     None   20171225  5.561372e+07
19     UGC               United Game Chain     None   20171225  1.000000e+09
20     HCT               Hash Credit Token     None   20171225  1.500000e+09</code></pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<h2 id="-logo-">区块链LOGO列表</h2>
<p>Tushare Pro 提供了全球绝大多数数字货币的基础信息，其中就包括了Logo图标。罗列在此的目的是为了方便打算在区块链里面创业，正在寻求Logo思路的同学，所以，主要是为：1)借鉴思路  2)避免“撞衫”。</p>
<p>以下只是部分Logo,如需全部Logo图片文件一次性下载，请关注“挖地兔”公众号留言索取。</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<h2 id="-">全球区块链项目白皮书</h2>
<p>Tushare Pro提供了全球所有区块链项目的白皮书供有需求的用户查阅和下载，以下只罗列了部分项目。如对全部或指定项目打包下载，请关注“挖地兔”微信公众号留言。</p>
<p>在线浏览白皮书，需登录，如果没有帐号，请在此<a href="https://tushare.pro/register">注册</a>。</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<div class="content col-md-9 col-sm-8 col-xs-12">
<div class="search-panel">
<div class="search-container">
<span class="fa fa-search search-icon"></span>
<input type="text" class="search-input" placeholder="Search">
</div>
</div>
<h2 id="-">数字货币每日市值</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：coincap<br>描述：获取数字货币每日市值数据，该接口每隔6小时采集一次数据，所以当日每个品种可能有多条数据，用户可根据实际情况过滤截取使用。   </p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>coin</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>coin代码, e.g. BTC/ETH/QTUM</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>交易日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>coin</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>货币代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>货币名称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>marketcap</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>市值（美元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>price</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>当前时间价格（美元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>vol24</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>24小时成交额（美元）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>supply</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>流通总量</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>create_time</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>数据采集时间</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口使用</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

df = pro.coincap(trade_date=&#39;20180806&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
df = pro.query(&#39;coincap&#39;, trade_date=&#39;20180806&#39;, coin=&#39;BTC&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>      trade_date   coin              name     marketcap         vol24          create_time
    0   20180806    BTC       BTC Bitcoin  1.232036e+11  1.719294e+07  2018-08-06 11:10:28
    1   20180806    ETH      ETH Ethereum  4.184291e+10  1.011476e+08  2018-08-06 11:10:28
    2   20180806    XRP           XRP XRP  1.710519e+10  3.929987e+10  2018-08-06 11:10:28
    3   20180806    BCH  BCH Bitcoin Cash  1.239949e+10  1.727725e+07  2018-08-06 11:10:28
    4   20180806    EOS           EOS EOS  6.480991e+09  9.062451e+08  2018-08-06 11:10:28
    5   20180806    XLM       XLM Stellar  4.654252e+09  1.877026e+10  2018-08-06 11:10:28
    6   20180806    LTC      LTC Litecoin  4.391543e+09  5.772298e+07  2018-08-06 11:10:28
    7   20180806    ADA       ADA Cardano  3.512526e+09  2.592707e+10  2018-08-06 11:10:28
    8   20180806  MIOTA        MIOTA IOTA  2.546902e+09  2.779530e+09  2018-08-06 11:10:28
    9   20180806   USDT       USDT Tether  2.440917e+09  2.437140e+09  2018-08-06 11:10:28
</code></pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<div class="container">
<div class="document">
<nav class="sidebar col-md-3 col-sm-4 col-xs-12">

            <div id="jstree">
                <ul class="list-unstyled components">
                    
                    <li class=" jstree-open  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=14">沪深股票</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=24">基础数据</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=25">股票列表</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=329">每日股本（盘前）</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=26">交易日历</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=100">股票曾用名</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=104">沪深股通成分股</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=112">上市公司基本信息</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=193">上市公司管理层</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=194">管理层薪酬和持股</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=123">IPO新股上市</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=262">备用列表</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </li>

<h2 id="融资融券交易汇总">融资融券交易汇总</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：margin<br>描述：获取融资融券每日交易汇总数据</p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>交易日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>exchange_id</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>交易所代码（SSE上交所SZSE深交所BSE北交所）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>开始日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>结束日期</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>交易日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>exchange_id</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>交易所代码（SSE上交所SZSE深交所BSE北交所）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rzye</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融资余额(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rzmre</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融资买入额(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rzche</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融资偿还额(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rqye</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融券余额(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rqmcl</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融券卖出量(股,份,手)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rzrqye</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融资融券余额(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rqyl</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融券余量(股,份,手)</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口使用</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

df = pro.margin(trade_date=&#39;20180802&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
df = pro.query(&#39;margin&#39;, trade_date=&#39;20180802&#39;, exchange_id=&#39;SSE&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>  trade_date exchange_id          rzye         rzmre         rzche  \
0   20180802        SZSE  3.495054e+11  1.347549e+10  1.463921e+10   
1   20180802         SSE  5.311746e+11  1.484584e+10  1.573947e+10   

           rqye       rqmcl        rzrqye  
0  1.083380e+09  24418046.0  3.505888e+11  
1  6.029618e+09  83721012.0  5.372042e+11  
</code></pre>
<p><strong>说明</strong><br>融资融券数据从证券交易所网站直接获取，提供了有记录以来的全部汇总和明细数据。<br>根据交所网站提示：数据根据券商申报的数据汇总，由券商保证数据的真实、完整、准确。</p>
<p>其中：<br>本日融资余额(元)=前日融资余额＋本日融资买入-本日融资偿还额<br>本日融券余量(股)=前日融券余量＋本日融券卖出量-本日融券买入量-本日现券偿还量<br>本日融券余额(元)=本日融券余量×本日收盘价<br>本日融资融券余额(元)=本日融资余额＋本日融券余额</p>
<p>2014年9月22日起，“融资融券交易总量”数据包含调出标的证券名单的证券的融资融券余额</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<h2 id="融资融券交易明细">融资融券交易明细</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：margin_detail<br>描述：获取沪深两市每日融资融券明细</p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>交易日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>TS代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>开始日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>结束日期</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>交易日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>TS股票代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>股票名称 （20190910后有数据）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rzye</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融资余额(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rqye</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融券余额(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rzmre</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融资买入额(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rqyl</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融券余量（股）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rzche</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融资偿还额(元)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rqchl</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融券偿还量(股)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rqmcl</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融券卖出量(股,份,手)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>rzrqye</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>融资融券余额(元)</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口使用</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

df = pro.margin_detail(trade_date=&#39;20180802&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
df = pro.query(&#39;margin_detail&#39;, trade_date=&#39;20180802&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>    trade_date    ts_code          rzye        rqye        rzmre       rqyl  \
0     20180802  000001.SZ  4.430811e+09   8238210.0   78800436.0   921500.0   
1     20180802  000002.SZ  2.613071e+09  30772020.0  186176338.0  1439290.0   
2     20180802  000006.SZ  8.214685e+08   1008250.0   15199626.0   185000.0   
3     20180802  000009.SZ  1.318175e+09     74451.0    8010979.0    15674.0   
4     20180802  000012.SZ  6.422077e+08    190201.0    7831261.0    38347.0   
5     20180802  000022.SZ  1.891423e+08   1761368.0    8868547.0    99400.0   
6     20180802  000027.SZ  3.583209e+08    104157.0    4235209.0    21300.0   
7     20180802  000028.SZ  2.885056e+08    524656.0    4737219.0    12100.0   
8     20180802  000030.SZ  1.076096e+08    965944.0    2717503.0   200820.0   
9     20180802  000031.SZ  5.659868e+08     90675.0    2056441.0    15500.0   
10    20180802  000036.SZ  3.974383e+08    620420.0    5980093.0   110199.0   
11    20180802  000039.SZ  1.047953e+09   2519010.0   17651054.0   215300.0   
12    20180802  000043.SZ  3.496989e+08     14532.0    2299872.0     2100.0   
13    20180802  000046.SZ  7.221042e+08   2208480.0   17142811.0   344000.0   
14    20180802  000049.SZ  3.914922e+08   1795218.0   12595082.0    65783.0   
15    20180802  000050.SZ  1.884433e+09    517992.0   51120876.0    38200.0   
16    20180802  000059.SZ  7.077480e+08    587805.0   49392632.0    78900.0   
17    20180802  000060.SZ  1.425264e+09   2372025.0   21992232.0   520181.0   
18    20180802  000061.SZ  6.317999e+08    547716.0    5760238.0   105128.0   
19    20180802  000062.SZ  5.627777e+08    795577.0    3060551.0    39191.0   
20    20180802  000063.SZ  2.581872e+09   3873697.0  194982814.0   276101.0   

           rzche     rqchl      rqmcl        rzrqye  
0    147005397.0  544400.0   260000.0  4.439049e+09  
1    133408689.0  437600.0   516700.0  2.643843e+09  
2     16084617.0   90000.0      100.0  8.224767e+08  
3     11337406.0   80000.0     2000.0  1.318249e+09  
4      8260616.0       0.0    26700.0  6.423979e+08  
5      8464082.0   10000.0    19400.0  1.909037e+08  
6      2999201.0   21700.0        0.0  3.584250e+08  
7      4526179.0    4400.0        0.0  2.890302e+08  
8      1906548.0   14140.0   171700.0  1.085755e+08  
9      4193433.0   37600.0     7500.0  5.660775e+08  
10     5291427.0       0.0        0.0  3.980587e+08  
11    24101032.0    1700.0    33900.0  1.050472e+09  
12     2852687.0   17200.0        0.0  3.497134e+08  
13     8927796.0  147100.0    48600.0  7.243127e+08  
14    12113754.0    1800.0    12900.0  3.932874e+08  
15    59634348.0       0.0     8600.0  1.884951e+09  
16    52573324.0       0.0    69700.0  7.083358e+08  
17    19472310.0  365340.0   458531.0  1.427636e+09  
18     3299825.0    6000.0    46728.0  6.323476e+08  
19     9640216.0    7420.0    32296.0  5.635733e+08  
20   201355327.0   63900.0    10900.0  2.585746e+09 
</code></pre>
<p><strong>说明</strong></p>
<p>本报表基于证券公司报送的融资融券余额数据汇总生成，其中：<br>本日融资余额(元)=前日融资余额＋本日融资买入-本日融资偿还额<br>本日融券余量(股)=前日融券余量＋本日融券卖出量-本日融券买入量-本日现券偿还量<br>本日融券余额(元)=本日融券余量×本日收盘价<br>本日融资融券余额(元)=本日融资余额＋本日融券余额</p>
<p>单位说明：股（标的证券为股票）、份（标的证券为基金）、手（标的证券为债券）。</p>
<p>2014年9月22日起，“融资融券交易总量”数据包含调出标的证券名单的证券的融资融券余额。</p>

require([
'jquery',

], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=217">国际宏观</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=218">美国利率</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=219">国债收益率曲线利率</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=220">国债实际收益率曲线利率</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=221">短期国债利率</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=222">国债长期利率</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=223">国债长期利率平均值</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                  
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=142">另类数据</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=143">新闻快讯</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=195">新闻通讯（长篇）</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=154">新闻联播文字稿</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=176">上市公司公告</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=202">新冠状肺炎感染人数</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=213">全球新冠疫情数据</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                  
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=263">财富管理</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=264">基金销售行业数据</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=265">各渠道公募基金销售保有规模占比</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=266">销售机构公募基金销售保有规模</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                  <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=209">数据索引</a></li>  <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=244">捐助</a></li>
                </ul>
            </div>
        
</nav>
<div class="content col-md-9 col-sm-8 col-xs-12">
<div class="search-panel">
<div class="search-container">
<span class="fa fa-search search-icon"></span>
<input type="text" class="search-input" placeholder="Search">
</div>
</div>
<h2 id="前十大股东">前十大股东</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：top10_holders<br>描述：获取上市公司前十大股东数据，包括持有数量和比例等信息<br>积分：需2000积分以上才可以调取本接口，5000积分以上频次会更高</p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>TS代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>period</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>报告期（YYYYMMDD格式，一般为每个季度最后一天）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>公告日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>报告期开始日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>报告期结束日期</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>TS股票代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>公告日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>报告期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>holder_name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>股东名称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>hold_amount</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>持有数量（股）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>hold_ratio</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>占总股本比例(%)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>hold_float_ratio</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>占流通股本比例(%)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>hold_change</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>持股变动</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>holder_type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>股东类型</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口用法</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

df = pro.top10_holders(ts_code=&#39;600000.SH&#39;, start_date=&#39;20170101&#39;, end_date=&#39;20171231&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
df = pro.query(&#39;top10_holders&#39;, ts_code=&#39;600000.SH&#39;, start_date=&#39;20170101&#39;, end_date=&#39;20171231&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>     ts_code  ann_date  end_date                        holder_name   hold_amount  hold_ratio
0  600000.SH  20180428  20171231   富德生命人寿保险股份有限公司-传统  2.779437e+09        9.47
1  600000.SH  20180428  20171231        上海国鑫投资发展有限公司  9.455690e+08        3.22
2  600000.SH  20180428  20171231  富德生命人寿保险股份有限公司-万能H  1.270429e+09        4.33
3  600000.SH  20180428  20171231  富德生命人寿保险股份有限公司-资本金  1.763232e+09        6.01
4  600000.SH  20180428  20171231          上海国际集团有限公司  6.331323e+09       21.57
5  600000.SH  20180428  20171231      中国移动通信集团广东有限公司  5.334893e+09       18.18
6  600000.SH  20180428  20171231        中国证券金融股份有限公司  1.216979e+09        4.15
7  600000.SH  20180428  20171231       梧桐树投资平台有限责任公司  8.861313e+08        3.02
8  600000.SH  20180428  20171231      中央汇金资产管理有限责任公司  3.985214e+08        1.36
9  600000.SH  20180428  20171231       上海上国投资产管理有限公司  1.395571e+09        4.75
</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

require([

], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

                        </ul>
                    </li>
                 
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=330">两融及转融通</a>

<h2 id="前十大流通股东">前十大流通股东</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：top10_floatholders<br>描述：获取上市公司前十大流通股东数据<br>积分：需2000积分以上才可以调取本接口，5000积分以上频次会更高</p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>TS代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>period</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>报告期（YYYYMMDD格式，一般为每个季度最后一天）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>公告日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>报告期开始日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>报告期结束日期</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p>注：一次取100行记录</p>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>TS股票代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>ann_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>公告日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>报告期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>holder_name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>股东名称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>hold_amount</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>持有数量（股）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>hold_ratio</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>占总股本比例(%)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>hold_float_ratio</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>占流通股本比例(%)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>hold_change</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>持股变动</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>holder_type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>股东类型</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口用法</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

df = pro.top10_floatholders(ts_code=&#39;600000.SH&#39;, start_date=&#39;20170101&#39;, end_date=&#39;20171231&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
df = pro.query(&#39;top10_floatholders&#39;, ts_code=&#39;600000.SH&#39;, start_date=&#39;20170101&#39;, end_date=&#39;20171231&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>     ts_code  ann_date  end_date                        holder_name   hold_amount
0  600000.SH  20180428  20171231  富德生命人寿保险股份有限公司-资本金  1.763232e+09
1  600000.SH  20180428  20171231          上海国际集团有限公司  5.489319e+09
2  600000.SH  20180428  20171231   富德生命人寿保险股份有限公司-传统  2.779437e+09
3  600000.SH  20180428  20171231        中国证券金融股份有限公司  1.216979e+09
4  600000.SH  20180428  20171231       梧桐树投资平台有限责任公司  8.861313e+08
5  600000.SH  20180428  20171231       上海上国投资产管理有限公司  1.395571e+09
6  600000.SH  20180428  20171231  富德生命人寿保险股份有限公司-万能H  1.270429e+09
7  600000.SH  20180428  20171231        上海国鑫投资发展有限公司  5.392559e+08
8  600000.SH  20180428  20171231      中央汇金资产管理有限责任公司  3.985214e+08
9  600000.SH  20180428  20171231      中国移动通信集团广东有限公司  5.334893e+09
</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>

require(['custom']);

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

                        </ul>
                    </li>

<h2 id="机器量化分析（一）数据采集、预处理与建模">机器量化分析（一）——数据采集、预处理与建模</h2>
<p>作者：Tushare社区用户 </p>
<hr>
<p>本系列主要介绍一套比较简单且完备的量化框架，该框架基于<strong><font color="#5B9BD5">现代投资组合理论</font></strong>，并应用主流的<strong><font color="#5B9BD5">机器学习算法</font></strong>进行分析，旨在帮助大家拓展量化投资的思路，辅助构建科学合理的投资策略。</p>
<p>作为系列第一篇，根据分析和计算流程，本篇主要介绍三部分：<strong><font color="#5B9BD5">数据采集，数据预处理，利用SVM算法进行建模</font></strong>。</p>
<h3 id="--数据采集--"><font style="background-color: #3DAAD6"> &gt;&gt; 数据采集 &lt;&lt; </font></h3>
<p>本系列的量化框架，全部采用本地化计算。为什么要本地化计算呢，因为相比在线获取数据进行分析计算，本地化计算有如下优势：</p>
<ul style="color:#5B9BD5">
    <li style="list-style-type:none">1. <strong>稳定</strong>——不会因网络不稳定而导致分析过程中断。</li>
    <li style="list-style-type:none">2. <strong>快速</strong>——本地化运算对于数据的访问速度比在线获取数据快，当机器学习的算法涉及到海量数据做训练集或迭代训练的时候，这一点尤其重要。</li>
    <li style="list-style-type:none">3. <strong>可复用</strong>——无论基础的行情数据还是加工处理后的数据，保存在本地后，对于后续进行结果分析或策略优化时更为方便。</li>
</ul>

<p>我们进行本地化计算，首先要做的，就是将所需的基础数据采集到本地数据库里，本篇的示例源码采用的数据库是<strong>MySQL5.5</strong>，数据源是<strong>tushare pro</strong>接口。</p>
<p>我们现在要取一批特定股票的日线行情，部分代码如下：</p>
<pre><code># 设置tushare pro的token并获取连接
ts.set_token(&#39;xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx&#39;)
pro = ts.pro_api()
# 设定获取日线行情的初始日期和终止日期，其中终止日期设定为昨天。
start_dt = &#39;20100101&#39;
time_temp = datetime.datetime.now() - datetime.timedelta(days=1)
end_dt = time_temp.strftime(&#39;%Y%m%d&#39;)
# 建立数据库连接,剔除已入库的部分
db = pymysql.connect(host=&#39;127.0.0.1&#39;, user=&#39;root&#39;, passwd=&#39;admin&#39;, db=&#39;stock&#39;, charset=&#39;utf8&#39;)
cursor = db.cursor()
# 设定需要获取数据的股票池
stock_pool = [&#39;603912.SH&#39;,&#39;300666.SZ&#39;,&#39;300618.SZ&#39;,&#39;002049.SZ&#39;,&#39;300672.SZ&#39;]
total = len(stock_pool)
# 循环获取单个股票的日线行情
for i in range(len(stock_pool)):
    try:
        df = pro.daily(ts_code=stock_pool[i], start_date=start_dt, end_date=end_dt)
        # 打印进度
        print(&#39;Seq: &#39; + str(i+1) + &#39; of &#39; + str(total) + &#39;   Code: &#39; + str(stock_pool[i]))
</code></pre>
<p>上述代码的注释部分已将每行代码的功能解释清楚了，实际上数据采集的程序主要设置三个参数：<font color="red">获取行情的初始日期，终止日期，以及股票代码池</font>。</p>
<p>当我们获取数据后，就要往本地数据库进行写入（存储）操作了，本篇代码用的是SQL语言，需提前在数据库内建好相应的表，表配置和表结构如下：</p>
<p><strong>库名：stock &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;表名：stock_all</strong><br><img src="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/u1/ml_qta_001.jpg" alt=""></p>
<p>其中 state_dt 和 stock_code 是<strong>主键和索引</strong>。state_dt 的格式是 ‘yyyy-mm-dd’（例：&#39;2018-06-11&#39;）。这样的日期格式便于查询，且在MySQL内部能够进行大小比较。<br><font color="red">（完整的数据采集代码详见 <a href="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/u1/qt_1.rar">Init_StockAll_Sp.py</a> 文件）</font></p>
<h3 id="--数据预处理--"><font style="background-color: #3DAAD6"> &gt;&gt; 数据预处理 &lt;&lt; </font></h3>
<p>无论是量化策略还是单纯的机器学习项目，数据预处理都是非常重要的一环。以机器学习的视角来看，数据预处理主要包括数据清洗，排序，缺失值或异常值处理，统计量分析，相关性分析，主成分分析（PCA），归一化等。本篇所要介绍的数据预处理比较简单，只是将存在本地数据库的日线行情数据整合成一份<strong>训练集数据</strong>，以用于后续的机器学习<strong>建模和训练</strong>。</p>
<p>在介绍具体的示例代码之前，我们需要先思考一个问题，<font color="red">应用有监督学习的算法对个股进行建模，我们的输入数据有哪些，我们期望得到的输出数据又是什么？</font></p>
<p>这个问题的答案因人而异，因策略而异。这个问题本身是<strong>将市场问题转化为数学问题</strong>的一个过程。依赖的是量化宽客自己的知识体系和对市场的理解。</p>
<p>回到正题，本篇示例我们将以最简单的数据进行分析，我们<strong>输入端的数据是个股每日基础行情，输出端数据是股价相较前一交易日的涨跌状态。</strong>简单点说就是，我们向模型输入今天的基础行情，让模型预测明天股价是涨还是跌。</p>
<p>在代码实现方式上，我们采用面向对象的思想，将整个数据预处理过程和结果，<strong>封装成一个类</strong>，每次创建一个类实例，就得到了特定条件下的一份<strong>训练集</strong>。示例代码如下：</p>
<pre><code>class data_collect(object):

    def __init__(self, in_code,start_dt,end_dt):
        ans = self.collectDATA(in_code,start_dt,end_dt)

    def collectDATA(self,in_code,start_dt,end_dt):
        # 建立数据库连接，获取日线基础行情(开盘价，收盘价，最高价，最低价，成交量，成交额)
        db = pymysql.connect(host=&#39;127.0.0.1&#39;, user=&#39;root&#39;, passwd=&#39;admin&#39;, db=&#39;stock&#39;, charset=&#39;utf8&#39;)
        cursor = db.cursor()
        sql_done_set = &quot;SELECT * FROM stock_all a where stock_code = &#39;%s&#39; and state_dt &gt;= &#39;%s&#39; and state_dt &lt;= &#39;%s&#39; order by state_dt asc&quot; % (in_code, start_dt, end_dt)
        cursor.execute(sql_done_set)
        done_set = cursor.fetchall()
        if len(done_set) == 0:
            raise Exception
        self.date_seq = []
        self.open_list = []
        self.close_list = []
        self.high_list = []
        self.low_list = []
        self.vol_list = []
        self.amount_list = []
        for i in range(len(done_set)):
            self.date_seq.append(done_set[i][0])
            self.open_list.append(float(done_set[i][2]))
            self.close_list.append(float(done_set[i][3]))
            self.high_list.append(float(done_set[i][4]))
            self.low_list.append(float(done_set[i][5]))
            self.vol_list.append(float(done_set[i][6]))
            self.amount_list.append(float(done_set[i][7]))
        cursor.close()
        db.close()
        # 将日线行情整合为训练集(其中self.train是输入集，self.target是输出集，self.test_case是end_dt那天的单条测试输入)
        self.data_train = []
        self.data_target = []
</code></pre>
<p>最终这个类实例化后是要整合出三个数据：</p>
<ul style="color:#5B9BD5">
    <li style="list-style-type:none">1. <strong>self.train</strong> ：训练集中的输入端数据，本例中是每日基础行情。</li>
    <li style="list-style-type:none">2. <strong>self.target</strong> ：训练集中的输出数据，本例中相较于前一天股价的涨跌，涨为1，不涨为0。并且在排序上，每条 t 交易日的self.train里的数据对应的是 t+1 天股价的涨跌状态。</li>
    <li style="list-style-type:none">3. <strong>self.test_case</strong> ：在 t 末交易日的基础行情数据，作为输入端，用于模型训练完成后，对第二天的涨跌进行预测。</li>
</ul>

<p><font color="red">（完整的数据预处理代码详见 <a href="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/u1/qt_1.rar">DC.py</a> 文件）</font></p>
<h3 id="--svm建模--"><font style="background-color: #3DAAD6"> &gt;&gt; SVM建模 &lt;&lt; </font></h3>
<p>机器学习中有诸多有监督学习算法，SVM是比较常见的一种，本例采用SVM算法进行建模。关于SVM的理论原理本篇不做详述，以下仅从实践角度进行建模介绍。</p>
<p>先贴一段建模、训练并进行预测的代码大家感受一下：）</p>
<pre><code>model = svm.SVC()               # 建模
model.fit(train, target)        # 训练
ans2 = model.predict(test_case) # 预测
</code></pre>
<p>三行代码，让人想起了把大象装冰箱分几步的冷笑话……</p>
<p>不过这侧面也说明Python在数据挖掘方面的强大之处：简单，方便，好用。</p>
<p>本例用的机器学习框架是<strong>scikit-learn</strong>。是个非常强大的算法库，熟悉算法原理的朋友可以查阅官方API文档，可修改模型参数，进一步调优模型；亦可尝试其他算法比如<strong>决策树，逻辑回归，朴素贝叶斯</strong>等。</p>
<p><font color="red">（完整的SVM建模代码详见 <a href="https://tushare.pro/files/pro/u1/qt_1.rar">SVM.py</a> 文件）</font></p>
<p>最后，我们虽然顺利建模并作出预测，但仍面对两个主要问题：1.模型预测能力如何？或者说该如何评估一个模型的质量？2.该如何结合模型进行仓位管理？风险如何？如何量化？</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');

const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
