<h2 id="指数基本信息">指数基本信息</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：index_basic，可以通过<a href="https://tushare.pro/webclient/"><strong>数据工具</strong></a>调试和查看数据。<br>描述：获取指数基础信息。</p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>指数代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>指数简称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>market</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>交易所或服务商(默认SSE)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>publisher</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>发布商</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>category</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>指数类别</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>TS代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>简称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>fullname</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>指数全称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>market</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>市场</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>publisher</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>发布方</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>index_type</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>指数风格</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>category</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>指数类别</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>基期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base_point</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>基点</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>list_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>发布日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>weight_rule</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>加权方式</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>desc</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>描述</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>exp_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>终止日期</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>市场说明(market)</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>市场代码</th>
<th>说明</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>MSCI</td>
<td>MSCI指数</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>CSI</td>
<td>中证指数</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>SSE</td>
<td>上交所指数</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>SZSE</td>
<td>深交所指数</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>CICC</td>
<td>中金指数</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>SW</td>
<td>申万指数</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>OTH</td>
<td>其他指数</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>指数列表</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>主题指数</li>
<li>规模指数</li>
<li>策略指数</li>
<li>风格指数</li>
<li>综合指数</li>
<li>成长指数</li>
<li>价值指数</li>
<li>有色指数</li>
<li>化工指数</li>
<li>能源指数</li>
<li>其他指数</li>
<li>外汇指数</li>
<li>基金指数</li>
<li>商品指数</li>
<li>债券指数</li>
<li>行业指数</li>
<li>贵金属指数</li>
<li>农副产品指数</li>
<li>软商品指数</li>
<li>油脂油料指数</li>
<li>非金属建材指数</li>
<li>煤焦钢矿指数</li>
<li>谷物指数</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>接口使用</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

df = pro.index_basic(market=&#39;SW&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>       ts_code    name              market     publisher   category     base_date  base_point  \
5    801010.SI    农林牧渔             SW      申万   一级行业指数  19991230      1000.0   
6    801011.SI    林业Ⅱ               SW     申万  二级行业指数  19991230      1000.0   
7    801012.SI    农产品加工           SW      申万   二级行业指数  19991230      1000.0   
8    801013.SI    农业综合Ⅱ           SW      申万  二级行业指数  19991230      1000.0   
9    801014.SI    饲料Ⅱ               SW     申万  二级行业指数  19991230      1000.0   
10   801015.SI    渔业                 SW      申万   二级行业指数  19991230      1000.0   
11   801016.SI    种植业               SW      申万   二级行业指数  19991230      1000.0   
12   801017.SI    畜禽养殖Ⅱ           SW      申万  二级行业指数  20111010      1000.0   
13   801018.SI    动物保健Ⅱ           SW      申万研  二级行业指数  19991230      1000.0   
14   801020.SI    采掘                 SW      申万   一级行业指数  19991230      1000.0

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<h2 id="指数日线行情">指数日线行情</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：index_daily，可以通过<a href="https://tushare.pro/webclient/"><strong>数据工具</strong></a>调试和查看数据。<br>描述：获取指数每日行情，还可以通过bar接口获取。由于服务器压力，目前规则是单次调取最多取8000行记录，可以设置start和end日期补全。指数行情也可以通过<a href="https://tushare.pro/document/2?doc_id=109"><strong>通用行情接口</strong></a>获取数据．<br>权限：用户累积2000积分可调取，5000积分以上频次相对较高。本接口不包括申万行情数据，申万等行业指数行情需5000积分以上，具体请参阅<a href="https://tushare.pro/document/1?doc_id=13">积分获取办法</a> </p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>指数代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>交易日期 （日期格式：YYYYMMDD，下同）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>开始日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>结束日期</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>ts_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>TS指数代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>交易日</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>close</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>收盘点位</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>open</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>开盘点位</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>high</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>最高点位</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>low</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>最低点位</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>pre_close</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>昨日收盘点</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>change</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>涨跌点</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>pct_chg</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>涨跌幅（%）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>vol</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>成交量（手）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>amount</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>成交额（千元）</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口使用</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

df = pro.index_daily(ts_code=&#39;399300.SZ&#39;)

#或者按日期取

df = pro.index_daily(ts_code=&#39;399300.SZ&#39;, start_date=&#39;20180101&#39;, end_date=&#39;20181010&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>        ts_code trade_date      close       open       high        low  \
0     399300.SZ   20180903  3321.8248  3320.6898  3325.6070  3291.7842   
1     399300.SZ   20180831  3334.5036  3333.3801  3356.5757  3310.8726   
2     399300.SZ   20180830  3351.0942  3385.8052  3402.5626  3349.4688   
3     399300.SZ   20180829  3386.5736  3393.0527  3398.7139  3377.1231   
4     399300.SZ   20180828  3400.1705  3408.1502  3416.5929  3388.8143   
5     399300.SZ   20180827  3406.5735  3339.3894  3406.5735  3339.2646   
6     399300.SZ   20180824  3325.3347  3308.4778  3353.0445  3291.8654   
7     399300.SZ   20180823  3320.0257  3308.4589  3336.1123  3285.8141   
8     399300.SZ   20180822  3307.9545  3328.9693  3328.9693  3299.3938   
9     399300.SZ   20180821  3326.6489  3271.8402  3331.7077  3270.0302   
10    399300.SZ   20180820  3267.2498  3238.2150  3267.2498  3209.0115   
11    399300.SZ   20180817  3229.6198  3305.8954  3311.5729  3224.0999   
12    399300.SZ   20180816  3276.7276  3251.8556  3315.2031  3231.5561   
13    399300.SZ   20180815  3291.9760  3371.9590  3372.1369  3288.7088   
14    399300.SZ   20180814  3372.9137  3386.4832  3391.7290  3356.6142   
15    399300.SZ   20180813  3390.3441  3369.9812  3396.1883  3336.6956   
16    399300.SZ   20180810  3405.0191  3398.4139  3424.0411  3380.5731
</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<section id="document" class="whole">
<div class="container">
<div class="document">
<nav class="sidebar col-md-3 col-sm-4 col-xs-12">

            <div id="jstree">
                <ul class="list-unstyled components">
                    
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=14">沪深股票</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=24">基础数据</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">
                            <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=25">股票列表</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=329">每日股本（盘前）</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=26">交易日历</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=100">股票曾用名</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=104">沪深股通成分股</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=112">上市公司基本信息</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=193">上市公司管理层</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=194">管理层薪酬和持股</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=123">IPO新股上市</a></li> <li ><a href="/document/2?doc_id=262">备用列表</a></li>
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                 
                    <li class="  in"><a href="/document/2?doc_id=15">行情数据</a>
                        <ul class="list-unstyled">

<h2 id="指数成分和权重">指数成分和权重</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：index_weight<br>描述：获取各类指数成分和权重，<strong>月度数据</strong> ，建议输入参数里开始日期和结束日分别输入当月第一天和最后一天的日期。<br>来源：指数公司网站公开数据<br>积分：用户需要至少2000积分才可以调取，具体请参阅<a href="https://tushare.pro/document/1?doc_id=13">积分获取办法</a> </p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>index_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>指数代码 (二选一)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>交易日期 （二选一）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>开始日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>None</td>
<td>N</td>
<td>结束日期</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>index_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>指数代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>con_code</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>成分代码</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>交易日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>weight</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>权重</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口调用</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">
pro = ts.pro_api()

df = pro.index_weight(index_code=&#39;399300.SZ&#39;, start_date=&#39;20180901&#39;, end_date=&#39;20180930&#39;)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例</strong></p>
<pre><code>    index_code   con_code trade_date  weight
0    399300.SZ  000001.SZ   20180903  0.8656
1    399300.SZ  000002.SZ   20180903  1.1330
2    399300.SZ  000060.SZ   20180903  0.1125
3    399300.SZ  000063.SZ   20180903  0.4273
4    399300.SZ  000069.SZ   20180903  0.2010
5    399300.SZ  000157.SZ   20180903  0.1699
6    399300.SZ  000402.SZ   20180903  0.0816
7    399300.SZ  000413.SZ   20180903  0.2023
8    399300.SZ  000415.SZ   20180903  0.0648
9    399300.SZ  000423.SZ   20180903  0.2100
10   399300.SZ  000425.SZ   20180903  0.1884
</code></pre>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>

require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>

<h2 id="-">优币指数成分</h2>
<hr>
<p>接口：<strong>ubindex_constituents</strong></p>
<p>描述：获取优币指数成分所对应的流通市值、权重以及指数调仓日价格等数据。</p>
<p><strong>输入参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>必选</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>index_name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>指数名称（支持的指数请见下表）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>start_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>开始日期（包含），格式：yyyymmdd</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>end_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>Y</td>
<td>结束日期（包含），格式：yyyymmdd</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>输出参数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>名称</th>
<th>类型</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>trade_date</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>指数日期</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>index_name</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>指数名称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>symbol</td>
<td>str</td>
<td>成分货币简称</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>circulated_cap</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>计算周期内日流动市值均值</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>weight</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>计算周期内权重</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>price</td>
<td>float</td>
<td>指数日价格</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>create_time</td>
<td>datetime</td>
<td>入库时间</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>支持的指数</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>指数名称</th>
<th>说明</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>UBI7</td>
<td>平台类TOP7项目指数</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>UBI0</td>
<td>平台类TOP10项目指数</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>UBI20</td>
<td>平台类TOP20项目指数</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>UBC7</td>
<td>币类TOP7项目指数</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>UB7</td>
<td>市场整体类TOP7项目指数</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>UB20</td>
<td>市场整体类TOP20项目指数</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口用法 1</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">pro = ts.pro_api()

pro.ubindex_constituents(index_name=&#39;UBI7&#39;, start_date=&#39;20180801&#39;, end_date=&#39;20180901&#39;)</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">pro = ts.pro_api()

pro.query(&#39;ubindex_constituents&#39;, index_name=&#39;UBI7&#39;, start_date=&#39;20180801&#39;, end_date=&#39;20180901&#39;)</code></pre>
<p><strong>数据样例 1</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>trade_date</th>
<th>index_name</th>
<th>symbol</th>
<th>weight</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>20180901</td>
<td>UBI7</td>
<td>ETH</td>
<td>30</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>20180901</td>
<td>UBI7</td>
<td>EOS</td>
<td>16.838142</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>20180901</td>
<td>UBI7</td>
<td>XLM</td>
<td>15.397589</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>20180901</td>
<td>UBI7</td>
<td>ADA</td>
<td>12.515037</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>20180901</td>
<td>UBI7</td>
<td>ETC</td>
<td>8.984187</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>20180901</td>
<td>UBI7</td>
<td>NEO</td>
<td>8.635051</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>20180901</td>
<td>UBI7</td>
<td>XEM</td>
<td>7.629994</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>
<p><strong>接口用法 2</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-python">pro = ts.pro_api()

pro.ubindex_constituents(index_name=&#39;UBC7&#39;, start_date=&#39;20180801&#39;, end_date=&#39;20180901&#39;, 
                         fields=&#39;trade_date, index_name, symbol, circulated_cap, weight, price, create_time&#39;)</code></pre>
<p>或者</p>
<pre><code>pro = ts.pro_api()

pro.query(&#39;ubindex_constituents&#39;, index_name=&#39;UBC7&#39;, start_date=&#39;20180801&#39;, end_date=&#39;20180901&#39;, 
          fields=&#39;trade_date, index_name, symbol, circulated_cap, weight, price, create_time&#39;)</code></pre><p><strong>数据样例 2</strong></p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>trade_date</th>
<th>index_name</th>
<th>symbol</th>
<th>circulated_cap</th>
<th>weight</th>
<th>price</th>
<th>create_time</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody><tr>
<td>20180901</td>
<td>UBC7</td>
<td>BTC</td>
<td>1.151072e+11</td>
<td>30</td>
<td>7065.42</td>
<td>2018-09-08 23:11:02</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>20180901</td>
<td>UBC7</td>
<td>XRP</td>
<td>1.356686e+10</td>
<td>21.400755</td>

</tr>

require(['custom']);

<script type="text/javascript">
require([
'jquery',
'jstree'
], function ($, jstree) {
$(document).ready(function() {
const tree = $('#jstree').jstree({
// plugins : ['state']
plugins : ['wholerow'],
core: {
themes: {
multiple: false,
icons: false,
stripes: false,
expand_selected_onload: true
}
}
});
tree.on("select_node.jstree", function (e, data) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${data.node.a_attr.href}`;
});
const searchInput = document.querySelector('.search-input');
const searchIcon = document.querySelector('.search-icon');
const onSearch = () => {
const query = searchInput.value;
if (query) {
window.location = `${location.protocol}//${location.host}/document/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`;
}
}
searchInput.addEventListener('change', onSearch);
searchIcon.addEventListener('click', onSearch);
});
});
</script>
